0.$description: Base value for smallest viewports (0px and larger).

640.$description: Used for small viewports (640px and larger).

768.$description: Used for medium viewports (768px and larger).

1024.$description: Used for large viewports (1024px and larger).

1280.$description: Used for extra large viewports (1280px and larger).

1536.$description: Used for ultra-wide viewports (1536px and larger).

interaction-emphasis.$description: Footer uses muted interaction emphasis theme override

We on purpose lower the interaction emphasis of all buttons inside Infobox and use the muted colors defined in semantics/colors/interaction-emphasis/muted. This token can not be used in Figma due to Figma restrictions. In this case, the token is static and does not react to dark/light mode.
Popover uses muted interaction emphasis theme override
